Apple___Apple_scab.treatment: Remove infected leaves and fruits, spray with a fungicide such as mancozeb or captan.

Apple___Black_rot.treatment: Prune infected branches and apply copper-based fungicide during dormant season.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.treatment: Remove nearby juniper trees and apply fungicide early in the season.

Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.treatment: Apply sulfur or neem oil spray. Ensure proper air circulation.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.treatment: Use resistant hybrids and apply fungicides containing strobilurins or triazoles.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.treatment: Spray fungicides when disease appears early, and plant resistant hybrids.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.treatment: Use crop rotation and resistant varieties, apply fungicide if needed.

Grape___Black_rot.treatment: Prune infected canes and apply fungicide regularly during humid periods.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).treatment: Remove infected vines, disinfect pruning tools, and apply systemic fungicides.

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.treatment: Spray mancozeb or chlorothalonil at first signs of infection.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).treatment: Remove infected trees and control psyllid insect vectors.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Prune infected twigs and spray with copper-based fungicide.

Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Use copper-based bactericides and avoid overhead irrigation.

Potato___Early_blight.treatment: Spray with fungicides like chlorothalonil or mancozeb at first signs of disease.

Potato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply metalaxyl-based fungicides and destroy infected tubers.

Squash___Powdery_mildew.treatment: Use sulfur-based sprays or potassium bicarbonate sprays weekly.

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.treatment: Remove old leaves, improve airflow, and spray fungicides.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Apply copper-based bactericides weekly during early infection.

Tomato___Early_blight.treatment: Use crop rotation and apply chlorothalonil or mancozeb sprays.

Tomato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides and remove infected plants immediately.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.treatment: Ensure good ventilation, apply chlorothalonil or copper fungicides.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.treatment: Remove infected leaves and apply fungicides regularly.

Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.treatment: Use neem oil or miticide and increase humidity around plants.

Tomato___Target_Spot.treatment: Remove infected leaves and apply broad-spectrum fungicide.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.treatment: Control whiteflies and remove infected plants.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.treatment: Disinfect tools, remove infected plants, and use resistant varieties.
